member.name: T:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails
member.summary: Sets the lines for an assembly info file

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Import(System.String[])
member.summary: Import a namespace. Will generate a using namespace; in C# and imports namespace in VB
member.remarks: Duplicate namespace imports will be automatically ignored

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.ComVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Explicitly states if this assembly is visible to COM clients. If the attribute is missing then the assembly is COM visible.

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.ClsCompliant(System.Boolean)
member.summary: States if the assembly is CLS Compliant. CLS compliant means that all classes only expose features that are common accross all .NET languages.
member.remarks: Things that make an assembly non-cls compliant: Exposing unsigned types. Unsafe types (e.g. pointers) should not be exposed. Operators should not be overloaded Two types or methods should not be included that differ only by case. e.g. doWork and DOWORK.

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Version(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the assembly version.
member.param: a version in the format of Major.Minor.[Build].[Revision]

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Version(System.Version)
member.summary: Sets the assembly version.

member.summary: Sets the title attribute of the assembly

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Description(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the description attribute of the assembly

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Copyright(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the copyright attribute of the assembly

member.summary: Sets the company attribute of the assembly

member.name: M:FluentBuild.AssemblyInfoBuilding.AssemblyInfoDetails.Product(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the product attribute of the assembly

member.summary: Execute the generation of the assembly info file and output it.
